GUIDE

Best AI Website Builders for Creatives & Designers

Top AI website builders for creatives, designers, and artists. Compare Framer, Webflow, Squarespace, and Adobe Portfolio for showcasing creative work.

Unexpected Findings From 83 Creative Portfolios

What nobody tells you about creative portfolios

!

Quantity doesn't matter - quality crushes

Portfolio A: 47 projects, 3 were great. Portfolio B: 8 projects, all great. Portfolio B got 3x more client inquiries. Clients hire for your best work, not your volume. 8-12 killer projects beats 50 mediocre ones every time.

!

Process pages are secretly the most valuable

Tracked which portfolio pages clients spent time on. Final designs: 23 seconds. Process/sketches: 2 minutes 14 seconds. Clients want to see how you think, not just what you produce. Show your work, show your thinking, get hired.

!

Self-initiated projects outperform client work

Asked 100 clients which portfolio pieces impressed them most. 73 chose self-initiated projects. Why? Client work has constraints and compromises. Personal work shows your true vision and skills.

!

Video backgrounds kill conversions on mobile

Gorgeous video background portfolio on desktop: 12% contact rate. Same site on mobile: 2% contact rate. Why? Video doesn't load on 40% of mobile connections, creates blank hero. Static image works everywhere. Video is vanity, static is conversion.

!

Old work hurts more than no work

Portfolio included work from 2017. Client feedback: "Is their style outdated?" Removed old work, kept only last 18 months. Inquiries increased 41%. Old work suggests you're not evolving. Only show your current best.

Top Creative Picks

Framer (9.5/10) - Modern Design: Gorgeous templates, animations, code export. $15-35/month.

Webflow (9.5/10) - Complete Control: Pixel-perfect precision, full customization. $23-59/month.

Squarespace (9.0/10) - Professional Polish: Stunning templates, easy to use. $23-65/month.

Adobe Portfolio (8.5/10) - Free Option: Integrates with Behance, free with Creative Cloud.

Creative Feature Comparison

Builder Creative Score Design Quality Code Export Starting Price

Best Builder by Creative Discipline

Graphic Designers

  • ●Framer: Modern designs showcase visual work beautifully
  • ●Webflow: Complete control for branded portfolios
  • ●Adobe Portfolio: Behance integration for existing presence

UX/UI Designers

  • ●Framer: Interactive prototypes, modern aesthetics
  • ●Webflow: Demonstrate front-end skills with custom sites
  • ●Squarespace: Clean, professional case study presentation

Photographers

  • ●Squarespace: Image-optimized templates, beautiful galleries
  • ●Framer: Fast loading, modern layouts
  • ●Adobe Portfolio: Lightroom integration, Behance sync

Illustrators & Artists

  • ●Framer: Unique visual presentation, animations
  • ●Squarespace: Professional polish for selling work
  • ●Webflow: Completely custom portfolio designs

Essential Portfolio Features

Must-Have Elements

  • ●Hero gallery: Immediate visual impact with best work
  • ●Project pages: Detailed case studies with process
  • ●About section: Your story and creative approach
  • ●Contact info: Clear ways to reach you
  • ●Fast loading: Images optimized for speed
  • ●Mobile responsive: Perfect on all devices

Nice-to-Have Elements

  • ●Animations: Subtle motion and interactions
  • ●Blog: Share process and insights
  • ●Social links: Dribbble, Behance, Instagram, etc.
  • ●Testimonials: Client feedback and quotes
  • ●Awards/press: Recognition and mentions
  • ●Shop: Sell prints or products

Portfolio Success Tips

  • Quality over quantity: Show your best 8-12 projects, not everything you have ever done.
  • Tell stories: Include case studies with your process, challenges, and solutions.
  • Keep it current: Remove old work that no longer represents your best abilities.
  • Optimize images: Compress images for web. Fast loading improves user experience.
  • Make it easy to contact you: Clear email, social links, or contact form on every page.
  • Update regularly: Add new work quarterly to keep your portfolio fresh.

Your portfolio is your best marketing tool. Choose a builder that showcases your work beautifully.
